## analyzeCommits() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Analyzes commits and validates against API changes.

This hook: 1. Analyzes actual API changes using change-detector 2. Compares against the proposed version bump from commits 3. Based on mode, either fails, warns, or overrides

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function analyzeCommits(pluginConfig: PluginConfig, context: SemanticReleaseContext): SemanticReleaseType | null;
```

**Returns:**
